Description:
Key RequirementsSuccessfully passed the GCE O/L and A/L examinations.
Minimum 3-year experience in banking or NBFI sector with similar exposure. 
Strong leadership skills and ability guide a team effectively to achieve the set objectives.
Excellent negotiation skills, interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills and good knowledge in working with MS excel.
Candidates who live in Kurunegala, Dambulla, Anuradhapura, Kegalle, Kuliyapitiya & Kandy will be given priority.Job Details
